file.name: deviceOperation-scopeId-deviceId-_query.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Device Management - Operations
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /{scopeId}/devices/{deviceId}/operations/_query:
    post:
      tags:
        - Device Management - Operation
      summary: Query the Registry Operations
      operationId: deviceRegistryOperationQuery
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId'
        - $ref: '../device/device.yaml#/components/parameters/deviceId'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/requestBodies/kapuaQuery'
      responses:
        200:
          description: The result of the query
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './deviceOperation.yaml#/components/schemas/deviceOperationListResult'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        403:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/subjectUnauthorized'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/{scopeId}/devices/{deviceId}/operations/_query": post: operation "deviceRegistryOperationQuery": parameters: parse parameter "": at 1:442: resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId" reference: external "../openapi.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
